apple_vendor_description: This couple emoji on Apple devices features a man with a medium skin tone and a woman with a medium-light skin tone, their forms gently outlined with soft, rounded edges. A vibrant, glossy heart hovers between them, rendered with Apple's characteristic 3D depth and realistic highlights, symbolizing their strong connection. The overall impression is one of warmth and affection, perfect for expressing love and togetherness in your digital communications on Apple devices.
